title: What are some good friendship songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hindi- Yaaro Dosti Badi hi Haseen Hai- Rockford Jaane Kyu Dil Janta Hai tu hai to I will be alright-Dostana Hum rahein ya na rahein kal- K.K Yaaro yahi dosti hai kismat se jo mili hai-Junoon Tere jaisa yaar kaha ,kaha aisa yarana- Yarrana Ye dosti hum nahi todenge-Sholay Dil chahta hai-Dil Chahta Hai Daaru desi-Cocktail Yaari hai imaan mera-Zanzeer Har ek friend zaruri hota hai-AIRTEL ad Jo mera hai wo tera hai-AIRTEL ad Tu hi to meri dost hai-Yuvraaj English- Count on Me- Bruno Mars I will be there for you-FRIENDS title track
